title: Panavise PortaGrip Phone Holder with Windshield Mount
features: Powerful windshield suction cup designed to hold your phone securely to vehicle windshield. Stays mounted in hot or cold

Fits most phones from 2.25 to 3.75 inches wide (with or without a case). Side arms adjust to fit nearly any phone (including the most popular handsets; iPhone 6/ 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S5, Note 4, Motorola Moto X, HTC, LG, OnePlus One)
Once the arm width is set, phone is easily removed by rocking it to the side with a one-handed motion
PanaVise Tilt, Turn & Rotate makes it fully adjustable. Low profile design minimizes mount behind phone
Vertical low profile grips allow full access to touch screens - rubberized indexed grippers and foam backed
description: The PanaVise PortaGrip Phone Holder with 811 Suction Cup Mount securely holds your mobile phone while you drive. Designed for todayâ€™s smartphones with large touchscreens, thin bezels, and various button and charging port configurations. The PortaGrip side arms adjust from 2.25 in. to 3.75 in. in width to fit nearly any phone. It attaches firmly to the vehicle windshield and stays mounted in hot or cold. The PortaGrip has many easy to use features including; rubberized grippers to securely hold your phone, foam backed cradle that wont scratch your devce, full access to touch screens, ratcheted feet allow access to charging/data ports and a quick release button for easy access.
